Description.Text: Royal Decameron Puerto Vallarta is a friendly 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation on the beachfront. Highlights include swimming pools and tennis courts. The hotel is located on the beachfront in Bucerias. Bucerias is a small fishing village with pretty cobblestone streets and a lovely stretch of beach. Popular sights in Puerto Vallarta include the Malecon, the Cuale Archaeological Museum and Playa Conchas Chinas. The hotel occupies a collection of modern mid-rise properties with colourful facades. Facilities include five outdoor swimming pools, three tennis courts, water sports, a gym, a beauty salon, and a choice of body and massage treatments. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a bright colonial style with locally-inspired colours. They feature a private balcony. Amenities include a safe, satellite TV and telephone. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. The Jap Jap restaurant offers delicious a-la-carte Japanese cuisine in a relaxed and friendly setting overlooking the garden. The Piccolo restaurant offers Italian cuisine in a charming atmosphere. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Free parking is possible onsite.
